General.Name: Pieridae Energy Ltd
General.Description: Pieridae Energy Limited operates as an energy producing company in Canada. It develops, produces, and processes natural gas, natural gas liquids, condensate, and sulphur. The company was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
